acts.act: Protection of Children from Sexual Offence Act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused absent. NBWA is issued against the accused.
Accused Mubarak Hussain is absent with step vide petition no. 634/18. Prayer is allowed. NBWA issued against accused Ikramul Hoque has returned without execution. Reissue the same.
Accused Mubarak Hussain is absent with step vide petition no. 1104/18. Prayer is allowed. NBWA issued against accused Ikramul Hoque has not yet returned. Issue reminder.

Accused Ekramul Hoque is produced from jail hazot. Remanded till 10-07-2018 for production. Accused Mubarak Hussain has appeared and prays to remain on previous bail vide petition no. 1888/18. Prayer is allowed. Bail petition vide petition no. 1889/18 moved on behalf of accused Ikramul Hoque will be considered after consideration of charge.
Accused Ekramul Hoque is produced from jail hazot. Remanded till 13-07-2018 for C.C. Accused Mubarak Hussain is present. Copy prepared and furnished to accused persons.

Accused Ikramul Hussain is produced from custody. Accused Mubarak Hussain is preent. After hearing both sides and perusing relevant materials on record charge U/S 366 (A) IPC R/W Sec-4 of POCSO Act, 2012 is framed against the accused and same is read over and explained to the accused to which he pleaded not guilty and claimed to be tried. Charge U/S 306 (A) IPC is framed against the accused Mubarak Hussain  and same is read over and explained to him to which he pleaded not guilty and claimed to be tried. Issue summon to PWs. Accused Ikramul Hussain is remanded to custody till 27-07-2018. Heard both sides on bail petition no. 1889/18 moved on behalf of accused Ikramul Hussain. Considering the length of detention accused Ikramul Hussain is allowed to go on bail of Rs. 30,000/- with one surety of the like amount I/d to custody.
Both the accused persons are present. PWs absent. Issue summon to PWs.
Accused Ikramul Hoque is present. Accused Mubarak Hussain is absent with step vide petition no. 3399/2018 which is allowed. One PW is examined, cross-examined and discharged. Issue summon to PWs.
Accused persons are present.No PW has turned up. Issue summon to PWs.
Accused persons are absent with step vide petition no. 1216/2019. Prayer is allowed. PWs absent. Issue summon to PWs. Fixing 29-07-2019 for Evidence.
Accused perosns are absent with steps vide petition No. 2047/2019. Prayer is allowed. PWs absent. Issue summon to PWs. Fixing on 25-09-2019 for Evidence.
Accused persons are absent with step vide petition No. 2669/2019. Prayer is allowed. No PW has turned up. Issue summon to PWs. Fix 17-12-2019 for Evidence.
Accused Mubarak Hussain is absent with step vide petition No. 3398/2019. Prayer is allowed. Another accused is present. PWs absent. Issue summon to PWs. Fix 18-02-20 for Evidence.
